snippet.title: The Farmer & the Chicken - Steam Demo trailer
snippet.description:
🎮 New demo available on Steam  - 🚩 Remember to wishlist
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2855280/The_Farmer__the_Chicken/
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

📣Unleash the chicken's power 🐓 and escape from the farmer 👩‍🌾 in this arcade adventure.  
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

👩‍🌾 "The Farmer & the Chicken" was originally made for GMTK Game Jam 2023. The theme was "Roles Reversed" so I  make a game where the player is a chicken and it must escape from the farmer, but each certain time it will get the hability to unlock his hidden power and reverse the roles.

The player must survive over 3 minutes to win, also get the most points possible. If he gets caught game over.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Twitter
https://twitter.com/MauroMarker

My games on Itch.io for gamejams | Mis juegos en Itch.io para gamejams
https://mmarker.itch.io/

My website | Mi sitio web
https://mmarker.net

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#indiegame #indiegamedev  #steam
